## Result:

# Model build:

Indicator select:
Season, Stage, MPG, GP, PFPG, X3PAPG, height_cm, weight_kg, Age
```{r}
# Standardize the outcome:
fit1 <- lmer(injury_level ~ height_cm + weight_kg + Age + MPG + X3PAPG + GP + PER + (1|Season), df_rs_aver_final)

summary(fit1)

re <- plot(fit1)
qq <- qqmath(fit1)
grid.arrange(re,qq,nrow=1)
```

```{r echo=FALSE,fig.height=2, fig.width=4, fig.cap="Residuals vs Leverage."}
ggplot(data.frame(lev=hatvalues(fit1),pearson=residuals(fit1,type="pearson")),
      aes(x=lev,y=pearson)) +
    geom_point() +
    theme_bw()
```
